Title: Ye Maaya Chesave
Writer: Umarji Anuradha (dialogue), Gautham Menon (screenplay), Gautham Menon (story)
Actors: Naga Chaitanya Akkineni, Samantha Ruth Prabhu, Krishnudu, Sanjay Swaroop
Plot: Karthik finishes engineering school and aspires to become a filmmaker. His friend Krishna takes him to director Puri Jagannath and pleads with him to take him as his assistant. Meanwhile, ...
